name: Pursuit (Patience)
description:
Pursuit is a short, 1-bit horror adventure game made by Patience for the 1-bit Jam 2021.

Features:

  • Explore the paths in any order you want
  • Use your resources creatively
  • A radar to see what's too far

Controls:

Arrows = Movement
Z = Use the Knife
X = Use the TNT
C = Interact
Tab = Radar
F/F4/Alt+Enter = Fullscreen
Esc(Hold) = Close the game
